summary: This document appears to be a list of records and documentation related to the administrative detention and death of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July-August 2019. It includes references to his cellmate Efrain Reyes, various logs, medical records, and internal memos concerning the incident and subsequent investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the document, listed as deceased with registration number 73618-054. The document references numerous records concerning his detention, property, medical and psychological observation, and the events surrounding his death.

persons.name: Efrain Reyes
persons.context: Inmate with registration number 85993-054 who was Epstein's cellmate. The document includes court documentation and search logs related to him.

connections.description: Reyes was Epstein's cellmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, as indicated by the document referencing him as such.

events.title: Administrative Detention Order for Epstein
events.description: An Administrative Detention (AD) order was issued for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Suicide Watch Logs Begin
events.description: Documentation includes Suicide Watch Chronological logs for July 23 and 24, 2019, indicating Epstein was placed on suicide watch.

events.title: Suicide Watch Logs Continued
events.description: Suicide Watch Chronological logs continue for July 24, 2019.

events.title: Extended Psychology Observation
events.description: Psychology Observation Log books cover the period from July 8 to October 10, 2019, documenting psychological monitoring of Epstein.

events.title: Second Psychology Observation Period
events.description: A second set of Psychology Observation Log books covers July 24 to July 30, 2019.

events.title: Court Documentation and Lt's Log
events.description: Court documentation regarding WAB (likely Within Bureau) and a Lieutenant's log entry dated Friday, August 9, 2019, related to the incident.

events.title: SHU Weekly Review and Roster
events.description: Special Housing Unit (SHU) report weekly review dated August 8, 2019, and SHU roster for August 8 and 9, 2019.

events.title: SRO Review Roster
events.description: SRO (likely Special Review Officer) review roster dated August 6, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) (inferred from context of federal inmate records and SHU)
keyFacts: The document catalogs a comprehensive set of records related to Jeffrey Epstein's detention and death, including an Administrative Detention order from July 29, 2019.
Epstein was placed on suicide watch, with specific logs for July 23 and 24, 2019, and under extended psychological observation from July through October 2019.
Epstein's cellmate was identified as inmate Efrain Reyes (Reg. No. 85993-054), and documentation related to him is included.
The list includes internal investigative materials such as TRUSCOPE search logs, staff memos, emails, and officer logs from early August 2019, indicating a post-incident review.
